name: WEHEWEHE Hawaiian English Dictionary Widget
author: Eli Scheetz

sections.description:
Just place the Widget on your sidebar to let your visiters translate words from Hawaiian to English or English to Hawaiian.

Plugin Updated Dec-18th
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the plugin into your WordPress plugins directory (usually /wp-content/plugins/).
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in your WordPress Admin.
  3. Place the widget on your sidebar through the ‘Widgets’ menu in your WordPress Admin.
sections.faq:
What do I do after I activate the Plugin?

Go to the Widgets menu in the WordPress Admin and add the “WEHEWEHE” Widget to your Sidebar or Footer Area.
sections.changelog:
4.14.49

  • Improved support for WordPress 4.1 and current web standards.

3.04.11

  • Updated URL for wehewehe.org queries.
  • Improved support for ʻokina and kahakō usage.

1.2.09.06

  • Fixed query string to accept escaped single-quotes as an okina by stripping backslashes.
  • Added Background Color Option to the Settings page.

1.2.09.01

  • Fixed query string to except spaces by adding urlencode for posted variables.
  • Added Menu Placement Options to the Settings page and updated styles on the right sidebar.

1.2.01.01

  • First versions uploaded to WordPress.
